description: HPE OneView universe app integrates with HPE Synergy to add/remove Synergy nodes into an existing DC/OS cluster
name: hpe-oneview
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS hpe-OneView is installed!
